ValidationRule.description: Validate that correct fields are set to enter ready to staff state.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( pse__Status__c , 'Ready to Staff') , OR( ISNULL(pse__Start_Date__c) , ISNULL(pse__SOW_Hours__c) ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must have a valid Start Date and Hours to change status to Ready to Staff
